snippet.title: Aliens™ Armageddon
snippet.description:
Aliens™ Armageddon a Xenomorph plague is unleashed on Earth causing apocalyptic devastation. Mankind’s only hope for survival is to fight their way to a deep space cargo ship and leave the Earth behind. Aliens features a 55 inch LED cabinet, enhanced gun system, eye catching Aliens topper and four frantic levels of non-stop shooting action, with players battling an onslaught of all new alien enemies.

GAME FEATURES:

- Deluxe model comes standard with a massive 55 inch HD LCD display

- 42" mounted gun version available

- 4 Chapters

- Force feedback guns

- Cabinet lighting synchronized with in-game actions

- Cutting edge graphics and sound

- Lighted multi-layer alien topper

- Online Leaderboards

Available in a 55″ deluxe cabinet and 42″ fixed gun cabinet.
